goobi:goobi.goobi:metadata: Collection of newspaper cuttings some with death notices of family members

Collection of newspaper cuttings some with death notices of family members, some reporting on the account of the alleged ritual murder of Eric Winter and the subsequent anti-Jewish pogrom in Konitz (Chodnice, Southwest of Danzig)

LIST OF SYNAGOGUES AND BETHAEUSER [houses of prayer] SET ON FIRE
